name: IWD Kigali 2018
description:
We are proud to be hosting the 2018 International Women's Day Celebration, a women's tech conference. This event will highlight the stories of our growing female community of designers, developers, and technology entrepreneurs.

The event will be interactive and fun with opportunities to learn from and network with women leaders that are shaping Africa. There will be workshops for soft skills development and technical training in Android development. We hope as we celebrate together, we also get our hands dirty by learning a skill at the event.

• Agenda
10:00 Doors Open, Registration
11:00 Opening Remarks
11:15 Fireside chat with Crystal Rugege, Business Director of Carnegie Mellon University, Africa
11:30 Icebreaker
12:00 Panel Discussion: The new horizon: Africa at the brink of technology
13:00 Break
13:10 Workshops
14:00 Entertainment
14:10 Networking and dinner
14:40 Closing Remarks
14:45 Photoshoot

Register here to tell us your workshop preference https://docs.google.com/forms/u/4/d/1CbA3lqvJ_UTCLK_gTnlx3wrKlF3ssvEuD4BNWMZaR9g/edit?usp=sharing

name: Kigali Google I/O Codelab
description:
Kigali Google I/O Codelab will provide a technical hands-on learning and networking meetup with talks on Google’s latest developer products. We aim to build a stronger Kigali developers community here in Rwanda.

We will have a hands-on codelab on Flutter, a Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. For more details, visit https://bit.ly/2JSJmxv or contact organizer.

Environment Setup:
Prior to the event, please setup the developer tools that will be used;

Set up the developer environment for Windows, Linux or MacOS - https://flutter.io/get-started/install/

Download Flutter SDK
Download and Install an editor – Vs Code or Android Studio (https://flutter.io/get-started/editor/#vscode or https://flutter.io/get-started/editor/#androidstudio)

Install the editor plugging
Test by creating a new flutter application

Get Started
https://flutter.io/get-started/codelab/

Giveaways
There will be giveaways awarded for tweeting event hashtags #flutterextended #flutterextendedKigali @flutterio @GdgKigali and for the best app.

name: Startups and Professionals Google Design Sprint @ KLab Kigali-RWANDA
description:
Welcome to a 3 day Startups and Professionals Google Design Sprint to be held on 2nd, 3rd and 4th of July, 2018. The hands on training will start from 4:00 pm to 8:00 pm at K-Lab Innovation Hub, Kigali. Certificates will be awarded for a successful completion of the three day training. For more information, please contact organizer.

A Design Sprint - "is a five-phase framework that helps answer critical business questions through rapid prototyping and user testing. Sprints let your team reach clearly defined goals and deliverable and gain key learning, quickly. The process helps spark innovation, encourage user-centered thinking, align your team under a shared vision, and get you to product launch faster," by Google
how_to_find_us: July  2nd, 3rd and 4th from 4:00 pm to 8:00 pm at K-Lab Innovation Hub, Kigali

name: Kigali AI Bootcamp 2018 in collaboration with Data Science CMU-Africa

venue.name: Carnegie Mellon University Africa
venue.address_1: Boulevard de l’Umuganda | Telecom House, 5th Floor

description:
The Kigali AI Bootcamp is an initiative of the CMU-Africa data science club and is geared to teaching hands-on skills in machine learning and deep learning to developers resident in Kigali with little or no AI experience over an extended period. This year's Bootcamp will be held from the 19th (Thur) to 26th (Thur) of this month from 6 pm to 9 pm each day and is being organized in partnership with GDG-Kigali.

The Bootcamp presents participants with an intensive and practical exposure to machine learning and deep learning with amazing tutors, speaker sessions and cutting-edge tools like Tensorflow and Sci-kit learn. See here for the detailed schedule: https://aibootcamp.xyz/schedule

Participation is free, but seats are limited and selection would be based on a first come first serve basis and prior programming experience.
Registration and more details can be found at https://aibootcamp.xyz
how_to_find_us: e.g Meet at the CMU Africa Auditorium, 5th Floor room C525 (https://aibootcamp.xyz/)

name: DevFest Kigali 2018

venue.name: University of Rwanda College of Business and Economics

description:
DevFest 2018 will be happening on Saturday, September 29th, 2018 from 1:00 pm to 7:00 pm targeting engineering and IT students, developers and technology enthusiasts in Rwanda.

During this event, you will have an opportunity to network with fellow developers and technology enthusiasts, to listen to amazing speakers ranging from their experiences on the theme Digital Wellbeing and get free swag. There will also be training sessions in Machine Learning and software development.

Register and plan to attend the event.
how_to_find_us: Meet us in the Left Theater, University of Rwanda - Gikondo Campus

name: GOOGLE DEVELOPER DAY
description:
Calling all Sub-Saharan Africa Android developers. #AndroidDev

Learn how to grow a successful app and games business from Google Play and meet your fellow devs on November 28th in Cape Town.

Register for the chance to join the Google team → http://bit.ly/DevDayAfrica

This event, hosted by the Google Play team, is for selected apps and games developers based in Sub-Saharan Africa, and will cover tips and best practices to build quality apps and grow successful businesses on Android and Google Play.
